channel.title: [MP] Shotgun Glitch
channel.description:
I've just found a bug while watching this gameplay video (yeah interesting place to find glitches, I know):
[youtube.com/watch?v=Xcgt6V-y3Kk](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xcgt6V-y3Kk) (At 8:43).
So here's the problem: The Shotgun seems to be held in an incorrect position, and more than this, seems to be floating in the hands of the Marine (I don't know if it happens only with this player model unfortunately). I don't know if the issue is related to the player animation or the world model of the Shotgun nor if it's it's present only in MP (from what I know MP has different models from SP) either, but, there ya go.
Apologies for not being an in-game screenshot but rather a cropped image from the video. But, a bug is a bug I guess, no matter where (or how) I find it, so long as it's valid: ![shotgunbug.png|690x479](upload://1RAsDOwBU9oqbEVL4zvKyxFUcUC.png)
